# harness_platform_har_registry (Data Source)

Data Source for retrieving a Harness Artifact registry

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_har_registry" "test" {
	identifier = "test_registry"
	space_ref = "accountId/orgId/projectId"
}
 ```
